title: Onnum Puriyala Lyrics Kumki Songs Lyrics

Singer: Immman
MOvie: Kumki
Music: D Immman
Lyricist: Yugabharathi		 Other Songs Lyrics

Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Onnum puriyala, solla theriyala
kannu muliyila, kanda azhagula
aasa koodudhey.

Uchanthalaiyila, ulla narambula
pathu viralula, thotta nodiyila
soodu yerudhey

Nethi pottu therikuthu
vittu vittu rekka mulaikuthu
nenjukuli adaikuthu,
maane

Manam buthi thaaviye
tharikettu oduthu
uyir onnaah serave
oru thittam poduthu ….Onnum puriyala

Alayira peyaa, avalathu paarva
enna thaakudhu vanthu enna thaakudhu
Paravura noyaa avalathu vaasam
enna vaatudhu ninnu enna vaatudhu

Avaladhu thirumeni veri kootudhu
avalidam adi vaanga vali kaatudhu
ava enna pesuvaa? atha enna thonudhu
ava enga thoonguvaa? atha kannu thedudhu
hey hey..yellae..

Onnum puriyala, solla theriyala
kannu muliyila, kanda azhagula
aasa koodudhey.

Kathir aruvalaa, manasaiyum keeri
thundu poduraa, enna thundu poduraa
Kalavara ooraa, ava uru maari
gundu podura chella gundu poduraa

Vizhiyila pala nooru padam kaaturaa
arupathu nilavaaga oli kootura
ava kitta vanthathum thala suthi aadudhu
ava etti ponathum ada buthi maarthu
hey hey..yellae…

kannu muliyila, kanda azhagula English Translation
